posts.title: Beginner full-body routine with progressions
posts.excerpt: 3-day template with push/pull/legs, RPE guidance, and rest timers.

content.text: Starting a fitness journey can be overwhelming. This 3-day full-body routine is designed to build a strong foundation of movements while allowing for maximum recovery.
Focus on compound movements like squats, presses, and rows. Perform 3 sets of 8-12 repetitions for each exercise, keeping an 'effort' level of 7 out of 10.

posts.title: Mobility primer for desk workers
posts.excerpt: 10-minute flows for hips, T-spine, and wrists you can embed in any article.

content.text: Prolonged sitting can lead to tight hip flexors and a rounded upper back. These three simple flows can be done in your office chair or standing up to reset your posture.
